name: Emily Lunetta
bio: I am a passionate and dedicated educator committed to supporting the whole child by fostering a classroom environment where students feel loved, supported, and safe. I believe in engaging, hands-on learning that enhances long-term memory and promotes student growth both academically and socially. I strive to instill not only curriculum knowledge but also essential life skills such as mindfulness, empathy, and responsible citizenship. I am dedicated to identifying and meeting students' emotional, social, and physical needs to ensure every child has the foundation to thrive.
